snippet: Japan has gained understanding from the Group of Seven industrialized nations on its stance on North Korea, top government spokesman Yoshihide Suga said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Japan Says Gained G7 Understanding on Its Stance on North Korea
headline.main: Japan Says Gained G7 Understanding on Its Stance on North Korea

lead_paragraph: Japan has gained understanding from the Group of Seven industrialized nations on its stance on North Korea, top government spokesman Yoshihide Suga said on Thursday.
